PerfectNetExp.abs: 普拉蒂纳记录了一道调好味的沙拉,其中的配料有“生菜、玻璃苣(borage)、薄荷、风轮菜(calamint)、茴香、欧芹、野生百里香、墨角兰、雪维菜(chervil)、苣苦菜(.
calamine 溴化氢, calamint 风轮菜属, calamine 菱锌矿土

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French calament, from medieval Latin calamentum, from late Latin calaminthe, from Greek kalaminthē

means.word_mean: 1. perennial aromatic herbs growing in hedgerows or scrub or open woodlands from western Europe to central Asia and in North America
